definitions.definition: A character or part played by a performer or actor.
definitions.example: Her dream was to get a role in a Hollywood movie, no matter how small.

definitions.definition: The expected behaviour of an individual in a society.
definitions.example: The role of women has changed significantly in the last century.

definitions.definition: The function or position of something.
definitions.example: Local volunteers played an important role in cleaning the beach after the oil spill.

definitions.definition: Designation that denotes an associated set of responsibilities, knowledge, skills, and attitudes
definitions.example: The project manager role is responsible for ensuring that everyone on the team knows and executes his or her assigned tasks.

definitions.definition: (grammar) The function of a word in a phrase.
In the Raku programming language, a code element akin to an interface, used for composition of classes without adding to their inheritance chain.
An ancient unit of quantity, 72 sheets of parchment.
